text:
morning, we discussed this before but want to bring it up again after doing a nextjs tutorial. It would be really cool if we could import from our files using `@` , so for example,
```import Something from '@/components/Something';```
maybe this is something I can add myself? Going to try this afternoon
this isn’t something that will currently work, i think we’d need to make some adjustments to our build process in addition to adding the equivalent configuration that nextjs uses
I don’t even think that making a `vite.config.js` with `alias: { "@": … }` will work locally with our dev server right now.
I don't know anything but don't let my dreams be dreams!
yeah i think we make a bunch of assumptions of ‘if it doesnt start with `.`, it’s an NPM package’ that this would go against

Thanks for the feedback <@UDHT6N5SM>, I think we’ll consider this kind of configuration in the future but personally I’m pretty hesitant to add new configuration (or support significant changes to `vite.config.js` ) yet.
